EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Cary, My name is Sara Conde and I received your contact information from Steve Arhancet. From this point on I’ll be your main point of contact at MBO. Steve has brought me up to speed on your background but if you would like to set up a time to chat you may go here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I look forward to working with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Steve Arhancet Sent: Monday, September 17, 2012 3:14 PM To: caclark@cox.net Cc: Sara Conde Subject: MBO Partners Information Cary, Enclosed is the teaming/brokering we spoke about over the phone. You’ll also find the information we discussed over the phone here, http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-arhancet.html <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-arhancet.html>. Regards, Steve Sara, Below you’ll find Cary’s contact information:Cary ClarkPhone number home 405 330 1493Email caclark@cox.net <mailto:caclark@cox.net> Regards, Steve___________________________________Steve ArhancetDirector, Consultant ServicesMBO Partners t: 703.793.6011f: 703.793.6081m: 540.560.8837e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com <mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
